CSSTransform-functionTranslateZ.summary:
The translateZ() CSS function repositions an element along the z-axis in 3D space, i.e.,
closer to or farther away from the viewer. Its result is a {{cssxref("<transform-function>")}} data type.

remarks.para:
This transformation is defined by a {{cssxref("<length>")}} which specifies how far inward or outward the
element or elements move.

blockquote.para:
Note: translateZ(tz) is equivalent to
translate3d(0, 0, tz).
